about_the_game:
Watch your step. You're walking on thin-ice!

You are Thomas Washington, and archeologist set on a quest to find a treasure chest holding a relic called the Cerulean Shard, located deep in a cave at the highest peak of Mount Tyson in Tyson, Georgia, while carefully navigating your way through the frozen ice patches, unstable bridges, dangerously hot geysers, and shaky mountain tops, throughout the Tundra. 4 hours of pure exploration and survival.

There is a lot of platforming and running in this semi-realistic first-person adventure game heavily inspired by Myst.

Just like the old days with Myst. No HUD. No guides or navigation markers (besides the main menu). No one on the radio telling you what to do or where to go. You think on your own feet and learn the land as you go. Learn, adapt, survive, or die.

_

This DLC is automatically bundled with JSC, however you can buy this standalone version individually here if you don't wish to buy the entire collection.

Watch your step. You're walking on thin-ice!

You are Thomas Washington, and archeologist set on a quest to find a treasure chest holding a relic called the Cerulean Shard, located deep in a cave at the highest peak of Mount Tyson in Tyson, Georgia, while carefully navigating your way through the frozen ice patches, unstable bridges, dangerously hot geysers, and shaky mountain tops, throughout the Tundra. 4 hours of pure exploration and survival.

There is a lot of platforming and running in this semi-realistic first-person adventure game heavily inspired by Myst.

Just like the old days with Myst. No HUD. No guides or navigation markers (besides the main menu). No one on the radio telling you what to do or where to go. You think on your own feet and learn the land as you go. Learn, adapt, survive, or die.

This DLC is automatically bundled with JSC, however you can buy this standalone version individually here if you don't wish to buy the entire collection.
name: 99 Cracks: The Winter Fix

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shadel Model 5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i9
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: A treasure chest holding a relic called the Cerulean Shard. Located deep in a cave at the highest peak of the an arduous mountain. Frozen ice patches, unstable bridges, hot geysers, shaky mountain tops. 4 hours of pure exploration and survival. No guides. You are on your own.
